item.title: Pop Mart Shares Fall on Demand Concern, Post-Index Entry Selling
item.description: Pop Mart International Group Ltd.’s shares tumbled, reflecting concerns over product demand for the Chinese toy maker and profit taking after the stock’s inclusion into two major indexes.

item.title: Pop Mart, Health-Care Stocks Lead Hang Seng Index Contenders
item.description: Hang Seng Indexes Co. is likely adding Labubu doll-maker Pop Mart International Group Ltd. and several health-care firms to its Hong Kong stock benchmark, analysts say.

item.title: Pop Mart, Health-Care Stocks Lead Hang Seng Index Contenders
item.description: Hang Seng Indexes Co. is likely adding Labubu doll-maker Pop Mart International Group Ltd. and several health-care firms to its Hong Kong stock benchmark, analysts say.

item.title: Labubu Craze to Spur 350% Surge in Profit, China’s Pop Mart Says
item.description: Chinese toymaker Pop Mart International Group Ltd. expects the soaring global popularity of its Labubu plush toys to drive a threefold increase in first-half revenue and an even bigger boost to profit

item.title: Labubu Craze to Spur 350% Surge in Profit, China’s Pop Mart Says
item.description: Chinese toymaker Pop Mart International Group Ltd. expects the soaring global popularity of its Labubu plush toys to drive a threefold increase in first-half revenue and an even bigger boost to profit
